alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 5:46PM MDT until May 11 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 545 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of Long Valley, or 25 miles northeast of Martin, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Long Valley around 555 PM MDT. Eagle Nest Butte around 605 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include George Town and Wanblee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
